en.title: Warehouse Worker
en.description: Join our dynamic warehouse team as a Warehouse Worker. This role involves various warehouse operations including receiving, storing, and distributing materials, equipment, and products.
responsibilities: Receive and process warehouse stock products
Perform inventory controls and keep quality standards high
Keep a clean and safe working environment
Operate forklift and other warehouse equipment
Pack and prepare orders for shipment
Maintain accurate records of warehouse activities
requirements: Team player with good communication skills

sl.title: Skladiščnik
sl.description: Pridružite se naši dinamični skladiščni ekipi kot skladiščnik. Vloga vključuje različne skladiščne operacije, vključno s sprejemanjem, skladiščenjem in distribucijo materialov, opreme in izdelkov.
responsibilities: Izvajanje kontrol inventarja in vzdrževanje visokih standardov kakovosti
Vzdrževanje čistega in varnega delovnega okolja
Upravljanje viličarja in druge skladiščne opreme
Pakiranje in priprava naročil za pošiljanje
requirements: Ekipni igralec z dobrimi komunikacijskimi veščinami
